title: What is a leaf and its types? - Quora

response.answer_text: The leaf is a part of the plant. It's going the role of photosynthesis producing Carbohydrate . The leaf is the unique structure as for the identification of the plant. It varies with the type of plants. Simple leaf and compound leaf and parallel and reticulate type of leaves. Reticulate is of dicot plants and parallel venation is of the monocot plants.

A leaf has three main parts – Leaf base, petiole and leaf lamina. In addition, it may possess two lateral outgrowths of the leaf base, called stipules. The leaf lamina is traversed by prominent vascular strands, called veins.
